post:
VPSGet has a vision of providing best quality services with affordable prices for each customer.

Our servers are located at Tier III datacenter in Netherlands, Europe.
All of our shared webhosting packages are cPanel based +Softaculous + WebSiteBuilder. With Softaculous you can install a lot of scripts to your website with only few clicks!(Wordpress, Joomla, OpenCart, phpBB,. Drupal,.. and many other ~412 scripts).


Features:• Free Managed Service*
• SSD powered RAID-10 storage
• Xeon E5 processors
• Automatic backups on external storage included.
• Weekly Malware and rootkit scan; +ClamAV
• SSH access available
• Softaculous 1click app installs
• cPanel
• WebSite Builder
• WHM Reseller access [upon request]
• 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
• 30 day Money Back Guarantee
• No Contract
• 24x7 Support (in-house team)
• Daytime LiveChat.
• Many payment methods accepted: Bitcoin, Paypal, Credit/Debit cards, 2checkout, Payza, BankWire. Altcoins accepted as well: litecoin, ethereum, zcash, monero, etc..
